replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
克哈之子 发表于 2020-6-24 18:25
能不能直接把显示手臂和去掉底盘的指令给我？我放弃挣扎了
/data modify entity @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,limit=1] ShowArms set value 1
/data modify entity @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,limit=1] NoBasePlate set value 1

看着改吧（小声
